list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: protect (something, especially an environmentally or culturally important place or thing) from harm or destruction.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the funds raised will help conserve endangered meadowlands

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a sweet food made by preserving fruit with sugar; jam.
